parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (11240014) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting purposes in Romanian political campaigns.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Dan Cosma and his affiliation with AUR (Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor), stating his position on the ballot for the Senate and Chamber of Deputies.  This directly refers to a parliamentary candidate and fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience in Bistrița-Năsăud County.  The reach estimate (100K-500K) and the use of Facebook as a public platform confirm that it addresses a wide population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's objective is clearly to promote Dan Cosma's candidacy. It highlights his activities in Bistrița-Năsăud County, presents his platform (linking to planulsimion.ro and programaur.ro), and explicitly encourages voters to support him by mentioning his position on the ballot ("poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot"). This strongly suggests an electoral objective to influence votes in favor of Dan Cosma and AUR, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. While it mentions problems and solutions for Bistrița-Năsăud County, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic reporting. The clear promotion of Dan Cosma and AUR overshadows any potential informative value.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured campaign message designed to promote a candidate and party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1734603870433438</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda according to Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Dan Cosma), is used during the electoral campaign (although the end date is given as 1732953600, which needs to be checked against the actual electoral calendar), has a clear electoral objective (promoting Cosma's candidacy), and is targeted at a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's content goes beyond simple information; it actively promotes a candidate and encourages voting for him.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Dan Cosma</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Dan Cosma, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1734603870433438) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatura sa pentru Senat și Camera Deputaților din partea AUR, cu menționarea explicită a poziției sale pe buletinul de vot ("poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot") și link-uri către platforma sa electorală (planulsimion.ro și programaur.ro), având un efect electoral clar de influențare a voturilor în favoarea sa și a partidului AUR. Reclama, cu o cheltuială estimată între 100 și 199 RON, a atins o audiență estimată între 100.000 și 500.000 de persoane în județul Bistrița-Năsăud, conform datelor din Facebook Ad Library. Prezența numărului CMF 11240014 confirmă natura electorală a reclamei.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale, încălcând prevederile legale.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt: cosdan63@gmail.com și +40766663210.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
